reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We enjoyed our 6 night stay at the Thiruvambadi, the pool was absolutely spotless, we had a great room with a view of the ocean and the gardens, our own fridge, TV and wireless internet.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is located at the far end of the North Cliff and down a few steps. It takes about 5 minutes to walk up to all the restaurants and bars that line the cliff. You're also only a 2 minute walk to Black Beach which is much quieter and way safer for swimming than the main beach at the foot of the North Cliff.
reviews.title: Wonderful Place (but only during good times)

reviews.text: We actually spent our first night in a small backpackers cabin as we knew we wanted a pool but would need time to walk around and check out a few hotels in the area before we got the best price and I can safely say that the Thiruvambadi is absolutely the best value hotel you'll find in Varkala with a pool.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel,Good Service, nice staff nothing to complain

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfasts are also great, freshly squeezed pineapple juice, toast, eggs and pineapple jam (amazing) every morning which was included in our room price.
reviews.title: A good standard Indian hotel

reviews.text: The staff were very friendly and went out of their way to help you any time day or night.
reviews.title: Peace and quiet

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 5 nights and enjoyed our stay. The location is pretty handy - it's at the North end of the cliff so it's a 5 minute walk back along the cliff to restaurants, etc. It's only a 1 minute walk to Black Beach though which is a nice beach with a bar right on it.
reviews.title: Worth staying here just for the pool.

reviews.text: The hotel has a nice pool, something I didn't see at any of the other places in Varkala. A great place to hang out during the day and eat your breakfast by in the mornings.
reviews.title: PLEASANT SMALL HOTEL

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast was nice and there were a few options to choose from. We didn't have lunch or dinner in the restaurant but the menu looked exactly like all the other menus in Varkala.
reviews.title: Nice hotel let down by service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Unfortunately we had an awful experience at this hotel, worst in 3 weeks India. We were offered 2 very dirty rooms downstairs, one worse than the other, we were given dirty bedsheets and dirty old towels (rather cloths), it seems the rooms and especially the bathroom hadn't been used in a while and was not prepared, it was dirty and to make it worse using the shower, there were a lot of ants and worms (larvae) coming out... The hotel staff and especially the manager didn't seem to care. They seemed to have quite nice rooms upstairs which were not offered to us. The pool is nice and location is ok, but couldn't make it up of course. It was too late at night to leave immediately, but naturally we left the next morning.
reviews.title: Awful experience

reviews.text: I stayed here twice last year, once with friends and once with my girlfriend and I can honestly say it was a wonderful experience.
reviews.title: Stunning

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Beautiful location, gorgeous pool, amazing staff (Assok is a credit to the place, a very charming helpful man)
reviews.title: The pool alone is worth the stay.

reviews.text: What can I say, just perfect.
reviews.title: Our favorite hotel in town (and we stayed at many)

reviews.text: Returned after one year and Ashok, our house boy, even remembered how spicy I like my curry. We get a cottage room near the pool. This is a quieter place to stay with easy access to Black Beach and the cliff. Will return again when we come this way.
reviews.title: Nice hotel but bad manager that doesn't keep his word
